channel.title: 软餐 - 新鲜软件资讯
channel.description: 软餐 - 新鲜软件资讯 - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: TikTok 试水 60 分钟的长视频
item.description:
短视频平台 TikTok 正在试水 60 分钟的长视频。该平台证实测试正针对特定市场的部分用户展开。这些用户可通过最新版桌面客户端或 App 上传 60 分钟长视频。TikTok 官方说不会立即广泛推出该功能。TikTok 在 2016 年上线时仅支持发布 15 秒钟短视频，此后逐渐拉长了视频长度。TikTok 此前还测试了水平全屏模式和视频拖拽缩略图。

Short video platform TikTok is testing 60-minute long videos. The platform has confirmed that the test is being conducted for specific markets and a selected group of users. These users can upload 60-minute long videos through the latest version of the desktop client or the app. TikTok officials have stated that the feature will not be widely rolled out immediately. When TikTok was launched in 2016, it only supported the publishing of 15-second short videos, but it has gradually increased the allowed video length since then. TikTok has previously tested horizontal full-screen mode and video drag-and-drop thumbnails. 分享告诉我更多。请问 TikTok 的水平全屏模式和视频拖拽缩略图测试的结果如何？你知道 TikTok 支持的最长视频长度是多少吗？

item.title: 「鬼秤」事件轰动全网，连云港官方账号集体关评论
item.description:
自媒体账号 「狂飙兄弟」 发布的江苏连云港买海鲜遭遇 「鬼秤」 视频，引发社交媒体广泛关注，这则视频在抖音获得了超过 37 万条评论。虽然连云港相关部门发布公告给出了处理进展，但网友们发现，「连云港发布」「连云港文旅」 等多个连云港市的政务抖音号 「集体」 开启了 「防打扰保护功能」，网友无法在其下发布评论。分析人士认为，「鬼秤」 事件给连云港城市形象带来恶劣影响，而官方账号集体关闭网评，进一步让该城市 「蒙羞」。

The video posted by the self-media account 「Kuangbiao Brothers」 showing the encounter with a 「rigged scale」 while buying seafood in Lianyungang, Jiangsu Province, has sparked widespread attention on social media. The video has received over 370,000 comments on Douyin (Chinese version of TikTok). Although the relevant departments in Lianyungang have issued announcements regarding the progress of the investigation, netizens have discovered that several official Douyin accounts related to Lianyungang, such as 「Lianyungang Announcement」 and 「Lianyungang Culture and Tourism,」 have collectively activated the 「Do Not Disturb」 feature, preventing users from leaving comments below their posts.

item.title: 音乐播放器 Winamp 将发布 Windows 版源代码
item.description:
老牌音乐播放器 Winamp Player 将于 9 月 24 日发布其 Windows 版本的源代码。官方称这将允许 「整个社区参与 Winamp 的开发」。现在，感兴趣的开发者已经可以通过 Winamp 官网表单索取源代码。Winamp 于 1997 年问世，官方宣称在全球拥有超过 8000 万活跃用户。

The long-standing music player, Winamp Player, will release the source code of its Windows version on September 24th. The official statement claims that this will allow the 「entire community to participate in the development of Winamp.」 Winamp was introduced in 1997, and the official announcement states that it has over 80 million active users worldwide. Interested developers can now request the source code through the Winamp official website form.

item.title: Threads 测试类似 TweetDeck 的功能：一屏查看多列内容
item.description:
Meta 首席执行官马克·扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）透露，社交媒体平台 Threads 正在开发类似 TweetDeck 的功能。它允许用户在一个屏幕中同时查看不同特定主题的内容提要。该功能正在有限的用户群中进行测试。同时查看多列内容有助于提高用户的浏览效率。

Meta’s CEO, Mark Zuckerberg, has revealed that the social media platform Threads is developing a functionality similar to TweetDeck. It will allow users to simultaneously view content summaries from different specific topics on a single screen. This feature is currently being tested among a limited user group. Viewing multiple columns of content at once helps improve user browsing efficiency.

item.title: Google One 的 VPN 服务下月将关停
item.description:
谷歌将于 6 月 20 日停止其云存储应用程序 Google One 的 VPN 服务。谷歌在 4 月份宣布将停止该服务，当时该公司称对 VPN 服务没有足够的兴趣。

  • Pixel 8 及更新版本的设备默认内置 VPN。对于这些用户来说影响不大。
  • Pixel 7、7 Pro、7a 和 Fold 还没有内置 VPN。这些设备将从 6 月 3 日起收到系统更新，以激活内置的 VPN 服务。
  • 其他设备用户将无法继续使用 Google One VPN，这些用户会被重定向到 Google 支持页面上的其他 VPN 服务。
